titles.title: Authorizing the printing as a House document of "A History, Committee on the Judiciary, United States House of Representatives, 1813-2006".
Authorizing the printing as a House document of "A History, Committee on the Judiciary, United States House of Representatives, 1813-2006".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.
Mr. Ehlers asked unanimous consent to discharge from committee and consider.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

vote.text: Received in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was passed by the House on November 15, 2006. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Authorizes the printing as a House document of "A History, Committee on the Judiciary, United States House of Representatives, 1813-2006" (or the document of the history of the Committee on the Judiciary which is prepared during the 109th Congress with such similar title as may be provided by the Committee).
